textAfterTable: How To Measure FAQs Q: How can I make sure I'm ordering the right size? A: Since we're an international company, our shoes may run larger or smaller than the standard sizes you're used to. It’s best to check the actual measurements(Foot Length and Girth) in the size chart on the shoe’s product page and compare them to your foot measurements before ordering. Q: How long can I receive my item? A: Total Time is based on the tailoring/processing time + shipping time, you will find them in product pages, it is between 5- 15 business days. Q: Can I return or cancel the shoes if I change my mind? A: After placing your order, there is still some time to change your mind. However, it is important to note that some of our dance shoes are made to order, and once the creation process has begun, the materials cannot be reused. Q: Can I order this shoe in a different width/heel height? A: Dance shoes labeled as “Customized” can be made in the heel height, width, size or color of your choice. You’ll find an explanation and a drop-down selection box for each available customized feature on the shoe’s product page. Please note this option is available for dance shoes in the customized
